Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
5 Hetuduka, Saṃkiliṭṭhattika
Hetuduka, Saṃkiliṭṭhattika
13.
35Hetuṃ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
36Nahetuṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
37Hetuṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
